description:
The H3 Humanities and Social Sciences Research
Programme is offered to Junior College students who
have exceptional ability and aptitude in Literature in
English. The student will embark on an independent
study and research under the supervision of a NUS
academic and will be assessed via an extended essay.
title: H3 Humanities & Soc Sci Research Prog
prerequisite: Reading the relevant H2 subject â€“ Literature in English.
